name: ServiceNow
description: ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW) makes the world work better for everyone. Our cloud-based platform and solutions help digitize and unify organizations so that they can find smarter, faster, better ways to make work flow. So employees and customers can be more connected, more innovative, and more agile. And we can all create the future we imagine. The world works with ServiceNow.

enhanced_description: ServiceNow is a cloud-based AI platform designed to digitize and unify organizations of every size, across all industries. It operates on a single platform, architecture, and data model to enable smarter, faster, and more efficient work flows. The platform leverages artificial intelligence, including generative AI capabilities, to predict issues, automate processes, and facilitate innovation. Its solutions connect and enhance experiences for employees, customers, agents, and developers, driving greater connectivity, innovation, and agility across the business.
